title: Toasted turkey and pastrami bagels
ingredients: ['4 bagels (plain, poppy seed or onion), split in half', '6 tbsp reduced-fat soft cheese, about 125g', '6 cocktail gherkins, rinsed and finely chopped', '3 tbsp chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '4 iceberg lettuce leaves', '1 large beef tomato, cut into 4 slices', '8 thin slices of lean roast turkey breast, about 170g in total', '8 slices of pastrami, about 110g in total']
